message:
🌟 Prepare for an Unparalleled Adventure! SROVolt is Unveiling Its Beta and Grand Opening! 🚀
🎮 Attention all adventurers and traders! SROVolt's beta phase arrives on January 12, 2024, followed by the grand opening on January 19, 2024! Get ready to dive into an extraordinary world!
🗓 Save the Dates:
🎯 Beta Opening: January 12, 2024
🚀 Grand Opening: January 19, 2024
🌍 SROVolt offers an exclusive experience with a level cap of 100, degree 10, and Silk spawning every hour. Immerse yourself in a world tailored for Chinese merchants, featuring disabled unions and a guild limit of 32.
⚔️ Stand out in this unique Silk Road adventure! Prepare to conquer, trade, and thrive! Join us in creating history. 
🌐 Discord: https://discord.gg/tup3f7XwF5
🌐 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SROVOLT
🌐 Website: Coming soon ^_^
